lead_paragraph: Hillary Rodham Clinton said Tuesday the nation's gun culture has gotten "way out of balance" and the U.S. needs to rein in the notion that "anybody can have a gun, anywhere, anytime."

headline.main: Hillary Clinton: Gun Culture 'Way Out of Balance'
headline.print_headline: Hillary Clinton: Gun Culture 'Way Out of Balance'

snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton said Tuesday the nation's gun culture has gotten "way out of balance" and the U.S. needs to rein in the notion that "anybody can have a gun, anywhere, anytime."...
